AtlasInterface:
Allows the end user to select a indicator.
Allows the end user to select a filter.
Runs an animation that loops through the time series data for the selected indicator.
Runs an animation that loops through the time series data for the selected indicator.
A graphically rich, highly customizable component that can be used to build up area profiles.
A graphically rich, highly customizable component that can be used to build up area profiles.
Displays a thematic map of the selected indicator alongside any support and background layers.
Displays the minimum, maximum, lower quartile, upper quartile and median for each feature.
Displays multivariate data in the form of a two-dimensional chart of three or more indicators represented on axes starting from the same point. Use in conjunction with the 'Selected Features Legend'.
Displays multivariate data in the form of a two-dimensional chart of three or more indicators represented on axes starting from the same point. Use in conjunction with the 'Selected Features Legend'.
For numeric indicators displays a bar for each feature in ascending or descending order. For categoric indicators each bar represents the number of features in each of the map legend classes.
Displays time series data for the selected indicator. Use in conjunction with the 'Selected Features Legend'.
The time series line legend component of the report.
Displays time series data for the selected indicator. Use in conjunction with the 'Selected Features Legend'.

The legend associated with the 'Stacked Associates' charts.
Each segment represents the number of features contained in each of the map legend classes
Display all indicators (or indicators with same date) in the current theme or associates of the current indicator. Use in conjunction with the 'Area Breakdown - Pie Chart' legend.
The legend associated with the 'Area Breakdown - Pie Chart'.
Display all indicators (or indicators with same date) in the current theme or associates of the current indicator. Use in conjunction with the 'Selected Features Legend'.
Contains a legend for the map alongside a list of layers.

<Component id="radarChart2" name="<%- db_double_geog_radarChart2_name %>" x="200" y="150" width="400" height="300" visible="false" moveable="true" removeable="true" resizeable="true" editable="true" icon="$IAICON/48x48/pie-chart.png" classes="ia-panel ia-panel-header">
Displays multivariate data in the form of a two-dimensional chart of three or more indicators represented on axes starting from the same point. Use in conjunction with the 'Selected Features Legend'.
